questions.question: What is the dimension of the resulting matrix when a 2x3 matrix is multiplied by a 3x4 matrix?
Which of the following is a necessary condition for matrix multiplication AB to be defined?
options: The number of rows in A must equal the number of columns in B.
The number of columns in A must equal the number of rows in B.
A and B must be square matrices.
A and B must have the same dimensions.
questions.answer: The number of columns in A must equal the number of rows in B.
